message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be valuable to you. My initial offer for this exceptional item is $500000. Let me know if this meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I am looking for a more affordable option. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $300000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In order to reach an agreement, I propose a counteroffer of $400000. This reflects my belief in the value of the product while considering your perspective. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $350000.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I've given it careful consideration and would like to propose a counteroffer of $425000. This amount reflects the value of the product while remaining open to negotiation. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find common ground. I would like to suggest a counteroffer of $400000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I've carefully considered your proposal and would like to counter with an offer of $450000. This reflects a compromise between our respective positions while still valuing the product appropriately. I hope this proposal is more favorable to you.
I appreciate your continued engagement in this negotiation, Alice. After evaluating the situation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $425000.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I've taken your feedback into account and would like to propose a counteroffer of $437500. This amount aims to bridge the gap between our positions while still ensuring fair compensation for the product. I hope this proposal is more suitable for you.
Thank you for your effort, Alice. Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $430000.
